scripts.prepare: node ./.setup.js && git submodule update --init --recursive && hardhat typechain
scripts.compile:all: hardhat compile && hardhat typechain && forge build && hardhat compile --network zktestnet
scripts.test: yarn test:unit && yarn test:integration && yarn test:fuzzing
scripts.test:debug: cross-env HARDHAT_DEPLOY_FIXTURE=true HARDHAT_FORK=mainnet HARDHAT_COMPILE=true hardhat test
scripts.verify: yarn compile && yarn hardhat typechain && yarn run format && yarn run lint && yarn run test && yarn slither-toolbox
scripts.deployment:rinkeby: yarn deploy rinkeby --export deployments/rinkeby/all-deployments.json && yarn hardhat etherscan-verify --network rinkeby  && yarn hardhat run scripts/scenario-testnet.ts --network rinkeby
scripts.deployment:tenderly: yarn deploy tenderly --export deployments/tenderly/all-deployments.json && yarn hardhat run scripts/verify-tenderly.ts --network tenderly --config hardhat-tenderly.config.ts
scripts.deployment:zktestnet: yarn compile:all && yarn hardhat deploy --network zktestnet --no-compile
scripts.deployment:re: rm deployments/rinkeby/ClearingHouseViewer.json && mkdir deploy2 && cp deploy/009_deploy_clearingHouseViewer.ts deploy2/clearingHouseViewer.ts && yarn hardhat deploy --network rinkeby --deploy-scripts deploy2/ && rm deploy2 -r
scripts.contract:size: echo 'maximum contract size is 24KB' && yarn run hardhat size-contracts
scripts.build:locally: cd ../hardhat-deploy && yarn build && cd dist && yarn pack && cd ../../increment-protocol && cp ../hardhat-deploy/hardhat-deploy-v0.11.12.tgz hardhat-deploy-v0.11.12.tgz
